                  <p>
                   The place of residence should be verified on the basis of the provision of the documents below:
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    a residence certificate issued in accordance with the candidateâs municipality normal registration rules, OR;
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    a certificate from the candidateâs place of work, study or training issued by the employer or institution in question
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   Both documents must have been issued within 12 months before the submission deadline of applying for an EMJMD student scholarship, i.e. the consortiumâs official deadline for student application.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    12-months residency rule
                   </strong>
                   : Applicants with Partner Country citizenship who have carried out their main activity (studies, training or work) for more than a total of 12 months over the last five years in any Program Country are considered Program Country applicants for participation costs.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    Distance calculator:
                   </strong>
                   If you apply for an EMJMD scholarship, you can check the applicable contribution to travel costs to:
                   <a href="https://ec.europa.eu/programmes/erasmus-plus/resources/distance-calculator_en">
                    http://ec.europa.eu/programmes/erasmus-plus/tools/distance_en.htm

         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #048f39;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  BIOREF CONSORTIUM FEE WAIVERS
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1573755412300 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="other-funding-bioref-master" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/other-funding-bioref-master.jpg" title="other-funding-bioref-master" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Consortium Fee Waiver
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Top ranked students who are admitted without the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Scholarship will also be considered for the Bioref Consortium Fee Waiver, which covers 100% of the
                   <strong>
                    participation costs
                   </strong>
                   .
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   To be considered for the fee waiver, students need just to submit a valid application before the deadline.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   The number of participation fee waivers per cohort is limited. Interested students should contact the programme officer (
                   <a href="mailto:master-bioref@univ-lille.fr">
                    master-bioref@univ-lille.fr
                   </a>
                   ) for further information about the application procedure.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

In order to keep doing so, the BioRef Consortium has started to work on renewing entirely the BioRef scientific program according to the last four cohortsâexperience and feedbacks. Moreover, the Consortium will be strengthened by the arrival of a very dynamic university from Spain!

                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #d3da06;text-align: center">
                 1- Admission requirements
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   If you are interested in applying for the Erasmus+ Master Programme in Bioref, please check if you meet the requirements below:
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    Awarded Bachelor of Science degree
                   </strong>
                   (min. 180 ECTS) in chemistry, biochemistry, chemical engineering and biology or related relevant fields.
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    <strong>
                     OR
                    </strong>
                    students in their last Bachelor year
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    <strong>
                     Language proficiency proof
                    </strong>
                    :
                    <ul>
                     <li>
                      <u>
                       B2 in English,
                      </u>
                      except when English is your mother tongue. If not, please provide one of the following documents:
                      <ul>
                       <li>
                        Official English test:
                        <ul>
                         <li>
                          IELTS 6.5 no section below 5.5
                         </li>
                         <li>
                          TOEFL 575 paper-based, 4,5 written, 190 computer-based, 90 internet-based (20 written)
                         </li>
                         <li>
                          or Cambridge or TOEIC, etcâ¦
                         </li>
                        </ul>
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Or a University letter attesting English is the medium of instruction of your higher education
                       </li>
                      </ul>
                     </li>
                    </ul>
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Application received before the end of the deadline
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Application form filled out in English
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   Application containing all requested elements and documents
                  </p>

                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    If you meet all requirements and want to apply to Bioref, the following list of documents will have to be attached to the application in a PDF format:
                   </strong>
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>

                   </li>

                   </li>

                   </li>

                   <li>

                   <li>

                     plenty of time

                   </li>

                    . If it is not the case, add an English translation approved by your university or by an official translator
                   </li>

                    <br/>
                    That is why we need a document as described in the chart below:
                    <br/>
                    Residence certificate issued in accordance with the candidateâs municipality normal registration rules OR Certificate from the candidateâs current place of work, study or training issued by the employer or institution in question
                    <br/>
                    Must have been issued by an official institution within 12 months before the application deadline
                    <br/>

    <div class="page-heading">
     <div class="container">

       <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-8">
        <h1>
         SELECTION PROCEDURE
        </h1>
       </div>
       <div class="pathway col-md-4 col-sm-4 hidden-xs text-right">
        <div class="breadcrumbs" xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#">
         <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/" property="v:title" rel="v:url">
          Home
         </a>
         \
        </div>
        <!-- .breadcrumbs -->
       </div>
      </div>
      <!--/row-->
     </div>
     <!--/container-->
    </div>
    <!--/page-heading-->
    <div class="top-sidebar">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
      </div>
      <!--/row-->
     </div>
     <!--/container-->
    </div>
    <!--/Top sidebar-->
    <div id="body">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="content-pad-3x">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12" id="content" role="main">
         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <section class="vc_section">
            <div class="u_row">
             <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
              <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
               <div class="vc_column-inner">
                <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                 <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <p style="text-align: center;">
                    Student Application for admission in the Biorefprogramme is entitled for students holding a
                    <strong>
                     Eurobachelor in Chemistry
                    </strong>
                    or equivalent education in the field of
                    <strong>
                     Chemistry, Biochemistry, Chemical Engineering.
                    </strong>
                    Students from all over the world are welcome to join the program.
                   </p>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <!--/u_row-->
           </section>
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInDownBig fadeInDownBig vc_custom_1573728086050" style="color: #1d9e35;text-align: center">
                 <strong>
                  THE SELECTION PROCESS FOR
                  <br/>
                  ALL ERASMUS MUNDUS STUDENTS IS ORGANIZED IN THREE STEPS:
                 </strong>
                </h2>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeInLeft fadeInLeft wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #c6d30a;text-align: left">
                 Step 1. Pre-selection:
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Applicants submit their electronic file to the programme coordinating institution for administrative checking and validation (i.e. that all documents are certified and correctly translated). Each applicant receives an acknowledgement of receipt of his electronic files.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInLeft bounceInLeft wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #c6d30a;text-align: left">
                 Step 2. Review and mark:
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Files are reviewed and marked on a scale from 1 (very poor) to 5 (outstanding) for each selection criteria by restricted academic board. Each file being examined at least two times thus receives at least two marks which are added and automatically averaged. After a first analysis and ranking of the applications, a shortlist determines students that will be interviewed by evaluators.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInLeft bounceInLeft wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #c6d30a;text-align: left">
                 Step 3. Interview of shortlisted candidates:
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The interview is designed to explore candidatesâ motivation to study on the BIOREF course, their critical thinking skills and general understanding of bioeconomy.Â  Candidates will also be able to ask questions about the BIOREF course.Â  Where possible, interviews will be conducted using Skype (audio and/or video).Â  Alternatively, it will be possible to phone shortlisted candidates on a landline or mobile number.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInLeft bounceInLeft wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #c6d30a;text-align: left">
                 Step 4. Final ranking:
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The final ranking of applicants will be made by combining the scores from the online applications and informations from the interview. The generated ranking is used by the Academic Board to establish a selection of approximately 50 applicants.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   The Bioref Consortium creates the following lists based on the final ranking of the short-listed application, awarding the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree scholarship to the top ranked students:
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Program Country Students â Admitted List
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Program Country Students â Waiting List
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Partner Country Students â Admitted List
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Partner Country Studetns â Waiting List
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   As soon as the lists are published, awarded students will receive a welcome box by mail which will contain everything he/she needs to manage his/her arrival (an admission letter describing the financial conditions, Erasmus+ certificate of scholarship award when applicable, an invitation letter from UTT, an accommodation form, a student guide and maps). The student guide includes all academic and practical information (regarding visa application, housing facilities, cost of living, enrolment formalities, and list of documents to be provided by the students for all formalities, library, sports, medical house and other facilities available on campus).
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-3 vc_col-has-fill">
              <div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1572425952514">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading vc_custom_1572426115567" style="color: #81d742;text-align: left">
                 Student application process
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Selected students will receive electronic invitation letter including all necessary information regarding inquiries about their visa applications. Documents will be sent to embassies in order to avoid sending original version by postal services. On request Bioref administrative can send original version and can interfere to the relevant embassies.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-9 vc_col-has-fill">
              <div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1572426982514">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: center">
                 Common admission criteria
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element vc_custom_1572426892087">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p style="text-align: center;">
                   The evaluation criteria are listed below and the percentages in brackets represent the weight of each criteria:
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="vc_chart vc_round-chart wpb_content_element vc_custom_1574247033553" data-vc-animation="easeInOutCubic" data-vc-legend="1" data-vc-legend-color="#2a2a2a" data-vc-legend-position="left" data-vc-stroke-color="#ffffff" data-vc-stroke-width="2" data-vc-tooltips="1" data-vc-type="pie" data-vc-values='{"labels":["Ranking of Academic Institution where undergraduate studies were carried out (based on the Shanghai ranking) (5%)","Academic records of previous studies (40%)","Scientific background of previous studies (20%)","Acquired practical experience (5%)","Motivation letter (10%)","Recommendation letters (10%)","Awards and grants (10%)","Mastering of English language (mandatory)"],"datasets":[{"data":[5,40,20,5,5,10,10,0],"backgroundColor":["#4cadc9","#75d69c","#00c1cf","#5aa1e3","#b97ebb","#f4524d","#50485b","#6dab3c"]}]}'>
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <canvas class="vc_round-chart-canvas" height="1" width="1">
                  </canvas>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
          </div>
         </article>
        </div>

    <div id="body">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="content-pad-3x">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12" id="content" role="main">
         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading vc_custom_1576143089883" style="color: #008d36;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  SCHOLARS / GUEST LECTURERS
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree in Bio-refineries â welcomes applications from
                   <strong>
                    leading academics and professionals
                   </strong>
                   from all over the world to be part of the programme as invited scholars / guest lecturers.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Objectives of stay of guest lecturers are varied:
                   <strong>
                    to teach and share knowledges
                   </strong>
                   with Bioref students as well as take advantage of the stay to do some research and develop partnership with the host institution (working on joint articles, developing ongoing projects, strengthening the Bioref network by identifying new ways of collaboration â¦).
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   For thethe academic year 2024-2025, guest lecturers have, guest lecturers have
                   <strong>
                    two possible host universities:
                   </strong>
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    1st semester September â January â The University of Technology of Troyes (France) â
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    2nd semester â January â July â Cracow University of Technology (Poland)
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   For the 2nd semester (September â January) of the academic year 2024-2025, guest lecturers have
                   <strong>
                    two possible host universities:
                   </strong>
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    The University of Bari Aldo Moro (Italy)
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    The University of Lille (France)
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   In order to see if you want to interact with our students on a topic taught in one the four universities of the consortium, please check the list of courses on the â
                   <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/course-catalogue/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
                    Course Catalogue
                   </a>
                   â section. You are also
                   <strong>
                    free to suggest
                   </strong>
                   a specific topic you want to share during your stay at the host institution.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1573057155440 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-has-fill">
              <div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1576144896866">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading vc_custom_1576142693511" style="color: #c6d30a;text-align: center">
                 <strong>
                  Eligibility criteria
                 </strong>
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element vc_custom_1576144912922">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Guest lecturers are expected to
                   <strong>
                    teach courses or give seminars
                   </strong>
                   in their field of competence for at least
                   <strong>
                    4 consecutive days
                   </strong>
                   in one host institution (travel time included).
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   The selection of scholars / guest lecturers is
                   <strong>
                    competition-based
                   </strong>
                   so the Bioref Academic Board will pay attention to each application to see if it fits with their
                   <strong>
                    minimum requirements:
                   </strong>
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Each guest lecturer needs to have a good level in
                    <strong>
                     English
                    </strong>
                    since it is the language of instruction of the Master program
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Specific attention will be given to applicants who demonstrate
                    <strong>
                     ability to teach at a high level
                    </strong>
                    and who
                    <strong>
                     have experience
                    </strong>
                    in his field of competence (either professors from higher education institutions or professionals from the private sector)
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    A guest lecturer paid by other EU funding scheme (including other Erasmus+ actions) cannot
                    <strong>
                     be considered eligible
                    </strong>
                    as every guest lecturers will receive a scholarship from the EMJMD in Biorefinery
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    The consortium is an
                    <strong>
                     equal opportunity employer
                    </strong>
                    . Minority individuals and persons with disabilities are encouraged to apply.
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading vc_custom_1576143171144" style="color: #91c11f;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  Guest lecturersâ scholarships
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Selected scholars / guest lecturers will be
                   <strong>
                    offered a scholarship
                   </strong>
                   to cover travel and accommodation costs and pay a remuneration.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Details of the available scholarships are set below:
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    Scholars from a
                    <u>
                    </u>
                    <strong>
                     Programme
                    </strong>
                    <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/erasmus-scholarship/#1573666015923-de4f5459-0688">
                     Country
                    </a>
                    : 1 200 â¬/week
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    Scholars from a
                    <strong>
                     Partner
                    </strong>
                    <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/erasmus-scholarship/#1573666015895-556d4a84-4dea">
                     Country
                    </a>
                    : 1 800 â¬/week
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   <em>
                    A âweekâ is defined as minimum 4 out of 7 consecutive calendar days. It is not possible to consider 8 consecutive days as 2 weeks.
                   </em>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Guest lecturers have also
                   <strong>
                    access to the facilities
                   </strong>
                   of the host universities (library, sports facilities, laundry facilities, computer rooms, etc.).
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-has-fill">
              <div class="vc_column-inner vc_custom_1576144959499">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #008d36;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  Selection of applicants
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element vc_custom_1576225820410">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    Top-level guest lecturers
                   </strong>
                   will be selected by the Academic Board based
                   <strong>
                    on excellence and on Consortium needs according to the specific topic of expertise.
                   </strong>
                   <br/>
                   Applicants will be contacted for further information, if necessary.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Selected scholars / guest lecturers receive information about logistical aspects at the host institution and about the scholarship they will receive.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Please note that the Bioref Academic Board may suggest changes to the course content if your proposal is accepted.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-has-fill">

                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">

                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">

                  </div>

              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading vc_custom_1576143329928" style="color: #dedc00;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  SELECTED SCHOLARS / GUEST LECTURERS
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   So if you are
                   <strong>
                    an expert
                   </strong>
                   of topics dealing with
                   <strong>
                    bio-refinery concept
                   </strong>
                   and want to share your knowledge with our Bioref students, donât hesitate to apply as you will bring added-value to the curriculum!
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   To apply, please complete and send

     <div class="container">
      <div class="content-pad-3x">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12" id="content" role="main">
         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Troyes-1" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Troyes-1.jpg" title="Troyes-1" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Troyes-2" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Troyes-2.jpg" title="Troyes-2" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #048f39;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  TROYES AND ITS REGION
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   An hour and a half from Paris by road or rail, Troyes, once the regional seat of power for the
                   <strong>
                    Counts of Champagne
                   </strong>
                   , is a city rich in
                   <strong>
                    art and history
                   </strong>
                   . The old city center has kept intact its
                   <strong>
                    medieval architecture
                   </strong>
                   with its
                   <strong>
                    half-timbered houses
                   </strong>
                   and
                   <strong>
                    Champagne checkerboard
                   </strong>
                   faÃ§ades of alternating dark-red and chalk bricks. The old city center is known locally as the â
                   <strong>
                    Champagne Cork
                   </strong>
                   â because of its unusual shape.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Present day Troyes (130,000 inhabitants including its suburbs) has a
                   <strong>
                    vibrant cultural and artistic life
                   </strong>
                   , a thriving economy and many sporting activities.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   With more than 5000 university students, Troyes has become a very
                   <strong>
                    attractive
                   </strong>
                   place for youngsters to follow their studies and to begin their professional careers.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Troyes remains today Franceâs
                   <strong>
                    textile capital
                   </strong>
                   both for production and marketing of textile products, notably through its numerous
                   <strong>
                    factory shops
                   </strong>
                   concentrated on two sites on the outskirts of the city.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   <span lang="EN-US">
                    The Aube region can pride itself on having attracted companies who are either national, European or world leaders in their various fields.
                   </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   While large enough to offer all the facilities of a major commercial and cultural center, Troyes still manages to be a
                   <strong>
                    friendly
                   </strong>
                   ,
                   <strong>
                    easy-going
                   </strong>
                   and
                   <strong>
                    safe
                   </strong>
                   place to live. Troyes is also close to some of the most beautiful
                   <strong>
                    countryside
                   </strong>
                   in the region: one third of the department is forested and has the highest
                   <span lang="EN-US">
                    number of artificial lakes in Europe.
                   </span>
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Troyes-3" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Troyes-3-1.jpg" title="Troyes-3" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Troyes-4" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="400" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Troyes-4.jpg" title="Troyes-4" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The Aube region is also famous for its
                   <strong>
                    champagne and wines
                   </strong>
                   : its vineyards produce a quarter of all Champagne production. âLa Route du Champagneâ takes you through charming villages and beautiful countryside.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Troyes, with its
                   <strong>
                    friendly and welcoming atmosphere
                   </strong>
                   , is the
                   <a href="https://www.utt.fr/vie-du-campus/vivre-a-troyes/">
                    ideal place to be a student
                   </a>
                   .
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Finding accommodation in Troyes is
                   <strong>
                    really easy
                   </strong>
                   , even for foreign students! The University of Technology of Troyes is located
                   <strong>
                    4 kilometers
                   </strong>
                   from the city center of Troyes.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Before your arrival,
                   <strong>
                    the UTTâs International Relationship Office will help you
                   </strong>
                   , for visa applications, finding accommodations with our housing partners, arrange your pick-up from the airport (Paris Roissy Charles-de-Gaulle), open a bank accountâ¦
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Upon your arrival, you will participate to the many activities organized by the student union during a
                   <strong>
                    fresher week
                   </strong>
                   , and participate in the special events of the BIOREF Mastersâ students.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>

               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Student life in UTT
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   There are many activities in which students can participate at UTT. Student life is really rich!
                  </p>
                  <h4>
                   <strong>
                    Sport
                   </strong>
                  </h4>
                  <p>
                   Sports play an important part of the studentsâ life. Students wishing to take part can subscribe to the sports union upon arrival (
                   <strong>
                    25â¬/ 1 semester â 50â¬ / 1 year â as for Sept 2019
                   </strong>
                   ).
                  </p>
                  <h4>
                   <strong>
                    Clubs and associations
                   </strong>
                  </h4>
                  <p>
                   There are over
                   <a href="https://www.utt.fr/vie-du-campus/la-vie-etudiante-a-l-utt/les-associations-clubs/les-associations-clubs-10926.kjsp?RH=1543508999785">
                    30 clubs and associations
                   </a>
                   that bring vitality to the campus. Among them:
                  </p>
                  <ul>
                   <li>
                    The
                    <a href="https://www.utt.fr/vie-du-campus/la-vie-etudiante-a-l-utt/le-bureau-des-etudiants-bde-/le-bureau-des-etudiants-bde--10132.kjsp?RH=1543508999785">
                     Studentsâ Union (BDE)
                    </a>
                    acts as a catalyst for all the associations. It coordinates most extra-curricular activities: clubs and associationsâ projects, parties and trips. It is also the studentsâ representative body for the university administration: bde@utt.fr
                   </li>
                   <li>
                    <strong>
                     Interlink (International Students Association)
                    </strong>
                    participates actively in the
                    <strong>
                     reception of foreign students
                    </strong>
                    . Its main objective is to facilitate the studentsâ integration in the university, in the city and in France. Throughout the year, it organizes
                    <strong>
                     several activities
                    </strong>
                    (cultural, artistic, sportsâ¦).
                   </li>
                  </ul>
                  <p>
                   There are more than
                   <strong>
                    40 sporting activities
                   </strong>
                   on offer: Basketball, Futsal, Rugby, Ultimate, Athletics, Badminton, Equestrianism, Judo, Handball, Volleyball, Water polo, Rowing, Boxing and many othersâ¦
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   <a href="https://www.utt.fr/vie-du-campus/le-sport-a-l-utt/le-sport-a-l-utt-6887.kjsp?RH=1543508999785">
                    More information here
                   </a>
                  </p>

        <h1>
         LIVING IN CRACOW
        </h1>
       </div>
       <div class="pathway col-md-4 col-sm-4 hidden-xs text-right">
        <div class="breadcrumbs" xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#">
         <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/" property="v:title" rel="v:url">
          Home
         </a>

    <div id="body">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="content-pad-3x">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12" id="content" role="main">
         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #048f39;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  WELCOME IN CRACOW
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Cracow is the historical capital of Poland, and as such, it is very deeply rooted in Polish tradition and culture. There is almost a tangible feel of history in the atmosphere of Cracow, strengthen by a number of museums and galleries. The theatres, a philharmonic and an opera house â all these places, together with a number of musical and film festivals, offer unforgettable cultural experience.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Cracow is also one of the most prominent academic centres in Poland with over 150,000 students community coming annually to study at one of 23 universities. Plenty of cafÃ©s, pubs and student associations cause that the city is very vivid.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   In addition to having all the benefits of a large city, including very well developed public transportation (trams, busses, short and long distance trains and planes), plenty of hotels, hostels and student dormitories, and numerous shopping malls and restaurants, Cracow is also very close to the Tatra Mountains (with many ski resorts and trekking routes near Zakopane), beautiful national parks â Pieniny and OjcÃ³w, as well as Dunajec River Gorge, which offers some interesting rafting opportunities, and easy access to more than 10 public thermal pools.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   The city attracts thousands of tourists every year, regardless of a season.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">

                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">

                   <img alt="Cracow Ã©glise" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Cracow-Ã©glise.png" title="Cracow Ã©glise" width="544"/>
                  </div>

           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700381897 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">

                   <img alt="Cracow 7 png" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Cracow-7-png.png" title="Cracow 7 png" width="544"/>

                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Cracow campus" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Cracow-campus-1.png" title="Cracow campus" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 A strong policy for welcoming international students
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Currently, the university educates 13.5 thousand full-time and part-time students of first (bachelor), second (master), PhD and postgraduate studies. The educational offer comprises 31 programmes of bachelor and master studies in Polish at 8 faculties. Moreover, 7 faculties offer
                   <u>
                    12 degree programmes in English
                   </u>
                   (
                   <a href="http://iro.pk.edu.pl/diploma-studies-2/">
                    http://iro.pk.edu.pl/diploma-studies-2/
                   </a>
                   ), both at the bachelor (http://iro.pk.edu.pl/bachelors-degree/) and master (http://iro.pk.edu.pl/masters-degree/) levels.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   All of the CUT faculties offer a wide variety of English-taught courses (
                   <a href="http://iro.pk.edu.pl/incoming-exchange-students/">
                    http://iro.pk.edu.pl/incoming-exchange-students/
                   </a>
                   ) for international exchange students from partner universities.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Such a wide range of programmes means variety of intellectual exploration and solving challenging tasks under the supervision of qualified scientific faculty. In the framework of bilateral agreements and the Erasmus + programme, Cracow University of Technology conducts research cooperation and student exchange with more than 160 international universities and institutes from 54 countries around the world. The detailed information on our partners can be found on
                   <a href="http://iro.pk.edu.pl/international-cooperation%20/">
                    http://iro.pk.edu.pl/international-cooperation /
                   </a>
                   .
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Helping students get started
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Each year more than 600 international students are admitted by CUT. This community is supported by the International Relations Office, Erasmus Office, as well as the CUT Erasmus Student Network association, that have a great experience in organization of extra sport, cultural and social events for international students. Students can also develop and deepen their interest joining 82 CUT scientific associations, whose activities often go beyond the walls of the university. They have opportunity to develop passion for sports becoming members of the CUT Academic Sports Association and using the CUT Sports and Recreation Centre. Our social and sports facilities belong to the most modern and sophisticated of all Cracow universities and technical universities in Poland. The university offers its students almost 2 thousand places in four dormitories.
                  </p>

     <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-8">
        <h1>
         LIVING IN LILLE
        </h1>
       </div>
       <div class="pathway col-md-4 col-sm-4 hidden-xs text-right">
        <div class="breadcrumbs" xmlns:v="http://rdf.data-vocabulary.org/#">
         <a href="https://master-bioref.eu/" property="v:title" rel="v:url">
          Home
         </a>
         \
        </div>
        <!-- .breadcrumbs -->
       </div>
      </div>
      <!--/row-->
     </div>
     <!--/container-->
    </div>
    <!--/page-heading-->
    <div class="top-sidebar">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
      </div>
      <!--/row-->
     </div>
     <!--/container-->
    </div>
    <!--/Top sidebar-->
    <div id="body">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="content-pad-3x">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-12" id="content" role="main">
         <article class="single-page-content">
          <div class="wpb-content-wrapper">
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #048f39;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  WELCOME IN LILLE
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   As the capital of a region of six million inhabitants (the Hauts-de-France region), Lille benefits from the advantages afforded by its unique setting. The city serves as the epicentre of an intense cultural life that springs from a rich heritage, derived from a long history at the heart of Europe. The University of Lille attracts many students thanks to a dynamic academic environment enriched by the proximity of international universities ranked among the best in the world.
                   <br/>
                   The students enjoy excellent study conditions across the large campuses that offer numerous associative, cultural and facilities. They have access to modern international-standard university residences, up-to-date libraries (learning centres) equipped with facilities for new ways of learning using digital technologies, as well as a highly developed rich and varied cultural calendar (cinema, exhibitions, theatres â¦).
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   A strong policy for welcoming international students
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="lille" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="315" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/lille.jpg" title="lille" width="1140"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700381897 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="living-lille-bioref1" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/living-lille-bioref1.jpg" title="living-lille-bioref1" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Exchange programmes
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The University of Lille continually develops and promotes student exchanges with high-quality institutions of higher education in the European Union and beyond, thanks to a variety of programmes (Erasmus +, etc.). It also promotes cosupervised doctoral theses, for which doctoral students do research alternately at the University of Lille and in an international institution.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700459534 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Helping students get started
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   The University of Lille has established a variety of events to welcome students and to help them get off on the right foot. Every year, the University of Lille organizes a
                   <br/>
                   student orientation session (JIVE), a time for exchanging impressions and sharing experiences that allows students to discover the different campuses and facilities of the university. Numerous athletic and cultural events are organized during this period. It is also an opportunity for newcomers to discover the campuses and services of the university. A specialized service accompanies students with disabilities throughout their time at the university, for example by providing specially adapted facilities.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="living-lille-bioref2" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/living-lille-bioref2-544x260.jpg" title="living-lille-bioref2" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700398634 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="living-lille-bioref3" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/living-lille-bioref3-544x260.jpg" title="living-lille-bioref3" width="544"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 A special welcome for international students
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Every year the University of Lille hosts a week-long celebration of international students: the International Student Week. This is an opportunity for French and international students to participate in many festivities and events on the theme of international exchange. The University of Lille also works in close partnership with the Lille branch of the ESN (Erasmus Student Network) to provide a warm welcome to international students and to provide support during their stay. A welcome meeting is organized by the ESN at the beginning of each semester. Exchange students can also take advantage of the chance to stay at the newly built Reeflex international residence hall.
                   <br/>
                   The university offers a selection of courses that are bilingual or taught entirely in English. In order to prepare for their exchange, thematic summer schools that include language training in French are available. International students can also take advantage of French language courses that will allow them to reach the level necessary for their studies (offered by the Department of French as a Foreign Language â DEFI) as well as French courses for particular scientific fields (offered by La Maison des Langues).
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
          </div>
         </article>

         <article class="single-page-content">

           <div class="u_row">

              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Panoramic view of old town in Bari, Puglia, Italy" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Bari-AdobeStock_155525259-scaled-544x260.jpeg" title="Old town of Bari, Puglia, Italy" width="544"/>

                   <img alt="Bari 2" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Bari-2-1.png" title="Bari 2" width="544"/>

           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="color: #048f39;text-align: left">
                 <strong>
                  DISCOVER BARI
                 </strong>
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   <strong>
                    Bari
                   </strong>
                   is the capital city of theÂ Metropolitan City of BariÂ and of theÂ ApuliaÂ region, on theÂ Adriatic Sea, in southernÂ Italy. The city itself has a population of almost 350.000 inhabitants, over 116 square kilometres, while the urban area has 1.200.000 inhabitants.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Bari is made up of four different urban sections. To the north is the closely built old town on the peninsula between two modern harbours, with the splendid Basilica of Saint Nicholas, the Cathedral of San Sabino (1035â1171) and the Swabian Castle built for Frederick II, which is now also a major nightlife district. To the south is the Murat quarter (erected by Joachim Murat), the modern heart of the city, which is laid out on a rectangular grid-plan with a promenade on the sea and the major shopping district.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1575988833748 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h2 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Cuisine and Gastronomy
                </h2>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element vc_custom_1575988606076">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Bariâs cuisine is based on three typical agricultural products found within the surrounding region of Apulia, namely wheat, olive oil and wine. The local cuisine is also enriched by the wide variety of fruit and vegetables produced locally. Local flour is used in homemade bread and pasta production including, most notably, the famous
                   <em>
                    orecchiette
                   </em>
                   ear-shaped pasta and
                   <em>
                    cavatelli
                   </em>
                   .
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Homemade dough is also used for baked
                   <em>
                    calzoni
                   </em>
                   stuffed with onions, anchovies, capers and olives; fried
                   <em>
                    panzerotti
                   </em>
                   with mozzarella, simple
                   <em>
                    focaccia alla barese
                   </em>
                   with tomatoes, little savoury
                   <em>
                    taralli
                   </em>
                   , friselle and
                   <em>
                    sgagliozze
                   </em>
                   , fried slices of polenta, all make up the Bari culinary repertoire.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Fresh fish and seafood are often eaten raw. Octopus, sea urchins and mussels feature heavily. Perhaps Bariâs most famous dish is the oven-baked
                   <em>
                    patate, riso e cozze
                   </em>
                   (potatoes with rice and mussels).
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Bari and the whole Apulian region have a range of wines, includingÂ Primitivo,Â Castel del Monte, andÂ Muscat, notablyÂ Moscato di Trani.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700535985 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-3">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <div class="wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left wpb_content_element">
                 <figure class="wpb_wrapper vc_figure">
                  <div class="vc_single_image-wrapper vc_box_border_grey">
                   <img alt="Bari 7" class="vc_single_image-img" decoding="async" height="260" loading="lazy" src="https://master-bioref.eu/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Bari-7-260x260.png" title="Bari 7" width="260"/>
                  </div>
                 </figure>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-9">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Places of interest in Bari
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   Alberobello is an UNESCO World Heritage Site and it is also unique and extraordinary, which makes it one of the best cities to visit in Southern Italy. Alberobello will give you the feeling of going back in time, but in a different way compared to Matera. Alberobello will make you think of the magical world of hobbits and dwarfs.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <!--/u_row-->
           <div class="u_row">
            <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1574700528376 vc_row-has-fill">
             <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
              <div class="vc_column-inner">
               <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                <h3 class="vc_custom_heading vc_do_custom_heading" style="text-align: left">
                 Events and cultural activities
                </h3>
                <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                 <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                  <p>
                   There are also many
                   <strong>
                    cathedrals
                   </strong>
                   and
                   <strong>
                    churches
                   </strong>
                   in Puglia which underline the artistic and historical development of the region. Their visit is vital to understand the artistic development of Puglia.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   All people, and thus all cultures, who lived and prospered in Puglia from the Lombards and Bizantines to the Normans and Swabians have left wonderful cathedrals, sanctuaries and churches.
                  </p>
                  <p>
                   Below a list of the best cathedrals to see in Puglia listed by province (area) from north to south.
                  </p>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>

             </div>

                  </div>
